name: Family with Children
description: Single parent story with focus on children's needs
transcript: Hello, my name is Amanda Davis. I'm a single mother of four children, ages 2, 5, 8, and 11. My husband passed away last year and I've been struggling ever since. I work two part-time jobs but it's still not enough to cover rent, food, and school supplies for the kids. We live in Houston, Texas. My oldest daughter needs glasses and I can't afford them. We also need help with childcare so I can work more hours. The kids sometimes go to bed hungry and that breaks my heart. I'm trying so hard but I need help. You can reach me at amanda.davis.mom@email.com or 713-555-8899. I just want to give my kids a better life.

segments.text: Hello, my name is Amanda Davis.
I'm a single mother of four children, ages 2, 5, 8, and 11.
My husband passed away last year and I've been struggling ever since.
I work two part-time jobs but it's still not enough to cover rent, food, and school supplies for the kids.
My oldest daughter needs glasses and I can't afford them.
We also need help with childcare so I can work more hours.
The kids sometimes go to bed hungry and that breaks my heart.
I'm trying so hard but I need help.
You can reach me at amanda.davis.mom@email.com or 713-555-8899.
I just want to give my kids a better life.
